snippet: David Rossi, the spokesman of Monte dei Paschi di Siena, which is at the center of an inquiry into suspected corruption and fraud, was found dead at the bank’s Siena headquarters.
abstract: David Rossi, spokesman of Monte dei Paschi di Siena, Italian bank at center of inquiry into suspected corruption and fraud, is found dead at bank’s Siena headquarters.
lead_paragraph: David Rossi, the spokesman of Monte dei Paschi di Siena, which is at the center of an inquiry into suspected corruption and fraud, was found dead at the bank’s Siena headquarters.
